integration_patterns: FHIR APIs for health information exchange

evidence.claim: PerformCare uses AWS for cloud infrastructure.
The company complies with HIPAA regulations in its operations.
PerformCare implements FHIR standards for data interoperability.
Integration with EHR systems is facilitated through X12 EDI standards.

icp.icp_reason: PerformCare engages in health data exchange using X12 standards, targeting healthcare providers.
